divs: sighting details5\15\2008 3:30 am i was awakened by my brother in law urging me to come to the window and look at several lights in the sky. i ran to the window, looked out and saw a small, blue, star-like object that seemed to descend and ascend while zigzagging. we live on the southern oregon coast and the objects were definitely miles and miles out over the ocean, high in the sky. then there was another next to the first one which seemed to bounce around ascending and descending. there were several others that we saw approx 5-8. as my wife, my brother in law, and myself continued to watch, a large, bright star-like object began moving like the other smaller ones. when i had first ran to the window and saw the small ones moving, i noticed the large star like one first, but did not think anything of it since it didn���t move. i thought perhaps it was a planet or large star reflecting light. then it started to bounce around left ���right up-down 45 degree angles in different directions. i ran and got the video camera but could not capture the low light of the objects. as the smaller ones bounced around in the sky, another one came from the south and crossed under the objects and moved north. i grabbed my binoculars and could see different colors coming from the large object; it seemed like a sequence of red, green, yellow-orange on bottom and a steady light on top. we sat and watched this until light, and what really caught my attention was the fact that the large object didn���t fade away like the stars did. it was constant and could be seen with the naked eye. i couldn���t make out a shape but i could still see the different color lights flashing. on a personal note, i have spent six years in the air force as a security policeman, i have been locked in hangars with stealth fighters, bombers and even f-22 raptors at nellis afb, nv from 2000-2002. i have seen numerous aircraft (foreign & domestic) up-close during red-flag exercise���s and what i saw last night was nothing like a conventional aircraft.
Summary: I was awaken by my brother at approx 3:30 am, he urged me to come to the window and look at this light in the sky.
